mapper.sql: select produceId, founderId, produceName, produceText, produceImage, produceNum, checkProduce, checkLove, useName, updateTime, registerTime from roomtable
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO roomtable ( founderId, produceName, produceText, produceImage, produceNum, checkProduce, checkLove, useName, registerTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{founderId}, #{produceName}, #{produceText}, #{produceImage}, #{produceNum}, #{checkProduce}, #{checkLove}, #{useName}, #{registerTime}, now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE produceNum = roomtable.produceNum + 1, updateTime = now();
mapper.select: where produceName like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and produceNum > 0 and checkProduce = 0 ORDER BY updateTime DESC;
where produceName like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') and produceNum > 0 and checkProduce = 1 ORDER BY updateTime DESC;
select produceNum from roomtable where produceId = #{id};
